original: 晉武帝司馬炎三子。仁厚寡言，但過目不忘，頗得司馬炎喜愛。惠帝登基後，賈南風弄政，司馬柬明哲保身，遠離權力鬥爭，得以倖免。
text: The third son of Sima Yan, Emperor Wu of Jin. He is kind and reticent, but he is not forgetting, and he is quite fond of Sima Yan. After Emperor Hui came to the throne, Jananfeng ruled, Sima Kam Mingzhe kept his life away from power struggles and was spared.
